entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:24 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
